public void textPaginateXMLFromJNI(java.lang.String fileName,
                                   double size)
                            throws java.io.IOException
This method calls xmark_jni.c and uses a JNI interface to transfer XML from C code to java. The resulting xml is put into the storage system with the ctext format

Parameters:
fileName - name of file to be placed in catalog

java.io.IOException

createStorage

public boolean createStorage(storagemanager.StorageConfig conf,
                             boolean format)
Attempts to create the storage specified by conf.

Parameters:
conf - a StorageConfig object specifying the storage.
format - If true, only create when storage does not exist. If false, only create when storage does exist.
Returns:
true if the storage was created, false if it wasn't.

useStorage

public boolean useStorage(storagemanager.StorageConfig conf)
Attempts to use the storage specified by conf.

Parameters:
conf - a StorageConfig object specifying the storage.
Returns:
true if the storage existed
